system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal
Effect: On hit, all valid targets have a 60% chance losing -1 SPDEF stage for 7 activations. Upon resolving this attack, the user freely uses Psychic Terrain.
Requirement: [Mew] Z-Power-Crystal as an Accessory Item and Psychic on the user's Active List.

actions.name: Genesis Supernova

cost.trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal
